name: Misspell
description:
Miss Spell has lost her spell book. It has run away and she must get it back before it falls into the wrong hands. Explore the dark woods as you grab spells and battle monsters.

Misspell is a small roguelike built upon a focus of items. In this game all items are one time use spells, and sometimes you will find treasure that will act as a passive boost for the player.

This is still a work in progress, It is getting closer to release.

Controls:

Arrows to move. Number keys to use Items.
